headline: Amazon (AMZN) Stock Upgraded to Overweight on AWS Growth Outlook
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is one of the AI Stocks Every Investor Should Watch. The firm has stronger conviction in AWS revenue acceleration in 2026 driven by Project Rainier capacity additions and peak […]

headline: Does UPS Share Price Slide Offer Opportunity After Latest Amazon Logistics Shift?
summary: If you are scratching your head about what to do with United Parcel Service stock, you are not alone. UPS has long been a household name in delivery and logistics, but its share price has taken investors on quite a ride lately. Over the past year, the stock has retreated by 33.7%, and since the start of the year it is down a steep 32.4%. Even the shorter-term performance has not inspired confidence, with minor drops of 0.4% in the past week and 4.7% over the past month. If you have been...

headline: What is setting Plex apart from the streaming competition?
summary: Plex CEO Keith Valory discusses the streaming platform's ad-supported video on demand (AVOD) service and content catalogs. Plex also allows users to stream their own personal media libraries. Also catch Keith Valory share his thoughts on the importance of media companies maintaining and upholding their free speech rights. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
